data.price: ហើយពិតប្រាកដណាស់ ជាមួយនឹងសេចក្ដីលំបាកវេទនា គឺភាពងាយស្រួល។
ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ ជាមួយនឹងសេចកី្ដលំបាកវេទនាគឺភាព ងាយស្រួល។

dua.name: Dua for Protection from Anxiety
dua.significanceReason: Promises divine relief after difficulty, offering hope and comfort to those experiencing mental and emotional challenges.

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.
